description:
Description
a panel of 18 observations  from 1960  to 1978
number of observations :  342
observation :  country
country :  OECD
title: Gasoline Consumption
reference: Baltagi, B.H.  and  Y.J.  Griggin (1983) “Gasoline demand in the OECD: an application of pooling and testing procedures”, European Economic Review, 22.

parameters.lcarpcap: logarithm of the stock of cars per capita
parameters.lrpmg: logarithm of real motor gasoline price
parameters.lgaspcar: logarithm of motor gasoline consumption per auto
